Notes: Turangarere until 1912. \Hihitahi\" is a sound-based local Maori word for \"locomotive\"."
Highest railway station in New Zealand.
Nearest station to the Tangiwai disaster, December 24, 1953.
Used as location for Smash Palace movie, 1981
Known to WW2 American servicemen as \Zero-10\". Shortest station name in the North Island
